(1) Employer’s Contribution to Retirement Fund (8.133%) and Workmen’s Compensation
(X. 5%) are included.
(2) Hie University of Illinois charges 5% of Expenditures for housing, custodial
services, billing and accounting services, purchasing services, etc.
(3) Also received $2,000 from University of Illinois College of Journalism and
Communications.
(4) Employees do not have to join Retirement System during first year of employment,
but may. Failure of some to do so is the reason for the rather large balance in this
account.
